text: Any suggestions for adding a quote calculator to Deals in HubSpot Sales? The client currently has this baked in with ACT!

I'd see if the built-in "Products" tool could fit their needs <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/contacts/how-do-i-use-products> or then develop a solution using crm extensions api <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/crm-extensions/crm-extensions-overview>

Thanks, Joni. I have been waiting with bated breath to see where the Product Library is going to land. When I asked about the details of the functionality last week they still did not have that info, so really happy to get these links from you.
Follow on question, any leads on dev teams that do the CRM Extension integrations?
Might be able to use Zapier or even Scribe Online to integrate Act! and HubSpot
Thanks, AJ. We do not want to integrate Act!, the client is planning to replace ACT! with HubSpot Sales.
